name: accepted
description: Issues that have been accepted by the maintainers for inclusion

name: blocked
description: Issues/PRs that cannot proceed at this point in time

name: duplicate
description: Issues that are a duplicate of another reported issue

name: enhancement
description: PRs that implement a new feature or substantial change

name: hacktoberfest
description: PRs to be included in Hacktoberfest

name: hacktoberfest-acccepted
description: PRs that are accepted by the maintainers as valid Hacktoberfest entries

name: help wanted
description: Issues/PRs that are good candidates for new contributors to look into

name: high priority
description: Issues that need to be more critically actioned

name: low priority
description: Issues that are backlogged for when things are less busy

name: maintenance
description: PRs that fix bugs, are translation changes or make only minor changes

name: needs docs
description: Issues/PRs that require changes to the documentation to be completed

name: needs pr
description: Issues that are awaiting a PR to be submitted

name: needs response
description: Issues/PRs where a maintainer is awaiting a response from the submitter

name: needs review
description: Issues/PRs that require a review from a maintainer

name: needs test case
description: Issues/PRs that need a test case to be implemented

name: stale
description: Issues/PRs that have had no activity and may be archived

name: third party
description: Issues/PRs that are dependent on changes made to a third-party library
